column4: anyone who could help me with a possibly simple problem with compiz? The expo doesnt pan out the windows, instead it shows all the workspaces.
that's the expo behavior in compiz
ok, but i dont remember changing anything?
not sure, expo (super-e) has always shown me all my desktops. I like having the lower left corner of the screen react to the mouse, showing them all and letting me move stuff from desktop to desktop
oh ok. so you dont use it to show all your windows then?
there's is no where that lets me choose what it shows though.
I have never seen expo show all my windows. I'm not sure what plugin you're thinking of
oh ok. oh well. maybe it wasnt expo then. i just remember i had this shortcut where all my windows became smaller and i was tiled on my workspace and i thought that was expo
gonna have to play with that one myself, I think I like it ;)
3 is the middle button (or 1 & 2 together if you don't have a 3 button mouse) , the others are usually on the side of the mouse
oh i see. ok thanks. my mouse only has 3 then =P
